message.name: ERR_SPG_NO_SERVICEPLANS_LINKED
message.locale: There are no suitable Service Plans configured for this Service Plan Group, please contact your Administrator.

message.name: ERR_SPG_NO_SP_SELECTED_FOR_LINKING
message.locale: At least one Service Plan must be selected to link to the Service Plan Group.

message.name: ERR_SPG_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSE_CLOSED
message.locale: The Service Plan %1s has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_SPG_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSE_OUTCOME_NOTDEFINED
message.locale: The Service Plan %1s cannot be closed because an outcome has not been defined for the service plan goal.

message.name: ERR_SPG_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSE_PRIVILEGES_FAILURE
message.locale: The Service Plan %1s cannot be closed because you do not have the appropriate privileges to close it.

message.name: ERR_SPG_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSE_REASON_MISSING
message.locale: The Service Plan %1s is missing a close reason.

message.name: ERR_SPG_CANNOT_CREATE_SAME_TYPE
message.locale: The Service Plan Group Delivery cannot be created because there is already one of the same type.
